about_the_game:
WARNING: THIS ADD-ON IS TOO HOT FOR MAINSTREAM CONSUMPTION

Like your party REALLY wild? The House Party Explicit Add-On adds a bunch of raunchy, edgy, and hilarious new content to the party that is too adult to fit into House Party’s ESRB “Mature 17+” rating! With now over 47 new lewd scenes developed specifically for this DLC and added to the game's original content, this content pack is also ever-growing!

This party isn’t for prudes…or the faint of heart. Only get this add-on if you’re down to see all the naughty stuff that is way “too adult” for society’s acceptance - unlike murder, decapitation, dismemberment and genocide. All that stuff is A-OK, and deemed much safer for your well being than seeing a nipple or heavens forbid…genitalia!

House Party is about choice, and we think the choice of adult content for 17+ players is realistic to the party experience.

MATURE VERSUS EXPLICIT (AND THE WAR AGAINST CENSORSHIP)

House Party’s already pretty edgy, right? Not edgy enough! This DLC replaces House Party’s cutscenes with high quality steamy scenes that show everything in its full glory.

This optional DLC is our way of countering the “powers that be” that won’t allow us to have a base game featuring realistic sexual content anywhere near the mainstream audience. We have been through hell and back fighting a ridiculous battle of discrimination and hypocrisy - where gratuitous violence is celebrated and our own bodies are something to be ashamed of.

Our small dev team works hard to develop this add-on alongside the base game (which we have to keep separate due to industry restrictions), and the small cost is to cover maintenance and future updates. We’re sorry if the tiny price tag offends anyone, and we appreciate everyone who purchases the DLC and supports House Party’s development. You’re keeping the party going, doods and lady-doods!

Anyway, back to the nudity. It's 2022, and we've got it all backwards. There's no reason this content needs to be locked away in the first place, unlike the plethora of violence that's allowed to exist unchecked. Let's normalize this shit. It's ALL adult content, so let's make love, not war for a change!

ALL TYPES OF INTIMACY (STEAMY CONTENT…NO MATTER WHAT YOU’RE INTO)

Whatever you like, this add-on has something for you! The House Party Explicit Content Add-On is packed with girl on guy, girl on girl, guy on guy, girl on girl on guy, guy on guy on girl...you get the picture. In our newest major content update specifically for this DLC, we’ve greatly expanded options for LGBTQ+ intimacy.

You can now access point-of-view style intimacy for the female content (that’s our non-cutscene, more interactive style…available ONLY in the explicit version of the game. You should check it out). Lesbian POV intimacy will correspond with the female player story and use more gender-accurate pairing acts, like scissoring, fingering, and female-centric sixty-nine poses! During gay POV sex between the male player and male NPCs, you can also now also swap between top and and bottom positions.

There are, of course, plenty of options for straight romance and group romance, too! And don’t forget you can create your own raunchy custom House Party stories using the Custom Story Creator on our official website. Have fun, get naughty, and enjoy, partiers!

AVAILABLE ONLY IN THE HOUSE PARTY EXPLICIT CONTENT ADD-ON:
  • 47+ new extended, sexy, and explicit cutscenes
  • Dozens more cutscenes coming soon
  • Detailed explicit nude textures for the player and all NPCs
  • Additional "too hot for mainstream" content in various questlines
  • Optional removal of "terrible things are happening" censor bars
  • Optional removal of mosaic nudity censors
  • Sandbox ability to "whip it out" (or "whip them out" if playing as a female)
  • Sandbox ability to "pleasure yourself"
  • Sandbox ability to pee and bladder UI meter
  • Sandbox ability to touch NPCs
  • Dynamic erections to surrounding elements for NPCs and the player. Seriously. That's a thing
  • Access to legacy sex system/scenes and orgasm UI meter
  • Reactions from all NPCs to the various sandbox elements

What are you waiting for? You won’t regret making your party the sexiest, raunchiest, and craziest it can be!

Note: If you purchased House Party before the “House Party Explicit Content Add-On” was released, please open a ticket on our Discord: ! You may be grandfathered into ownership of this extended add-on as a thank-you for being an “early supporter.”

Those who downloaded the House Party “uncensored” patch prior to 2021 will continue to own it permanently and their “uncensored” add-on will be automatically upgraded to the “House Party Explicit Content Add-On”. Although it contains some elements of the prior “uncensored” patch, this DLC is not to be confused with the “uncensored” patch, as it includes fundamentally new features and is receiving dedicated updates.

The House Party - Explicit Content Add-On also makes all the above described explicit content available (including an all new explicit cutscene) in the House Party - Murder Mystery Expansion Pack.

content_descriptors.notes: This downloadable content adds several "adult" features to the game, including nudity, graphic sexual content, and new sandbox interactions for the player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4500, AMD FX8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500, AMD Ryzen 3-1200 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB, AMD RX570 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Strong Sexual Content
Nudity
Strong Language
Use of Drugs
Use of Alcohol
Mature Humor

short_description: This DLC patch adds "adult" features to the game including longer, uncut, explicit and sexy cutscenes as well as several playground/sandbox type interactions for the player. You will also be able to enable legacy interactable free-look intimacy scenes as an alternative to the cutscenes.
